on.update: clampRange([brush_translate_anchor.extent_x[0] + abs(span(brush_translate_anchor.extent_x)) * brush_translate_delta.x / brush_translate_anchor.width, brush_translate_anchor.extent_x[1] + abs(span(brush_translate_anchor.extent_x)) * brush_translate_delta.x / brush_translate_anchor.width], invert("child_Horsepower_Horsepower_x", 0), invert("child_Horsepower_Horsepower_x", unit.width))
